content: Your username and password (collectively, the “Password”) will allow you to access the Web Site and certain information about you or your plan. Your Password is the exclusive property and confidential information of Blue Cross NC and Amerigroup and may be used solely for your individual use of and access to the Web Site. You are solely responsible for controlling your Passwords and for authorizing, monitoring and controlling access to your account. You are prohibited from distributing, providing or otherwise making available your Password to any third party and are responsible for all activities that occur under your Password. You agree to notify Healthy Blue immediately of any unauthorized use of your Password or of any need to deactivate the Password(s) associated with your account.
